scripts.link-deck: yarn link @deck.gl/core && yarn link @deck.gl/layers && yarn link @deck.gl/geo-layers && yarn link @deck.gl/mesh-layers && yarn link @deck.gl/aggregation-layers && yarn link @deck.gl/carto && yarn link @deck.gl/extensions
scripts.unlink-deck: yarn unlink @deck.gl/core && yarn link @deck.gl/layers && yarn link @deck.gl/geo-layers && yarn link @deck.gl/mesh-layers && yarn link @deck.gl/aggregation-layers && yarn link @deck.gl/carto && yarn link @deck.gl/extensions
